comments.comment: Oka thamai agollange sanskruthiya. Maha awwo boruwata Sinhala Boudda karma rakinna kiyala ape ahinsaka minissunwa kulappu karanawa. Oya kegahana wedi denekuge jeewana ratawa ohoma ma thamai.

comments.comment: Vimukthi daanne amuthu dance ekak  NEME. Dance gena danne nethi ayata eka amuthu athi. Eva rhamai real dance.
